text.*:
A Christian video game is a video game that incorporates themes from Christianity and is consistent with Christian values. This a list of Christian video game releases in order of release date.

Contents

  • 1 1980–1989
    • 1.1 1982
    • 1.2 1983
    • 1.3 1984
    • 1.4 1986
  • 2 1990–1999
    • 2.1 1991
    • 2.2 1992
    • 2.3 1993
    • 2.4 1994
    • 2.5 1995
    • 2.6 1996
    • 2.7 1999
  • 3 2000–2010
    • 3.1 2000
    • 3.2 2001
    • 3.3 2003
    • 3.4 2004
    • 3.5 2005
    • 3.6 2006
    • 3.7 2007
    • 3.8 2008
    • 3.9 2009
    • 3.10 2010
  • 4 2011-present
    • 4.1 2011
    • 4.2 2012
    • 4.3 2013
    • 4.4 2014
    • 4.5 2015
    • 4.6 2016
    • 4.7 2017
    • 4.8 2018
  • 5 References

1980–1989[edit]

1982[edit]

  • Bible Scramble Games - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[1]
  • The Memory Verse Games - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[2]
  • The Quail Game - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[3]
  • Moses' Rod - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[4]
  • Noah's Ark - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[5]
  • The Church Growth Game - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[6]
  • Heavenly Mansions - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[7]
  • The Exodus Game - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[8]
  • Manna from Heaven - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[9]
  • The Rapture Game - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[10]
  • Daniel & the Lion's Den - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[11]
  • Bible Computer Games - BibleBytes - TRS-80 Color Computer[12]

1983[edit]

  • Bible Computer Games - BibleBytes - Texas Instruments TI-99/4A, Timex Sinclair[13]
  • Music Machine - Atari 2600
  • Bible BASIC: Bible Games for Personal Computers - Apple II, TRS-80, Atari 8-bit family, Commodore VIC-20, Commodore 64
  • Red Sea Crossing - Atari 2600

1984[edit]

  • Bible Computer Games - BibleBytes - CP/M, Commodore VIC-20, Commodore 64, Apple IIe[14]
  • Computer Bible Games - Book 1 - Texas Instruments TI-99/4A, Timex Sinclair, TRS-80 Color Computer
  • Computer Bible Games - Book 2 - CP/M, Commodore VIC-20, Commodore 64, Apple IIe

1986[edit]

  • Bible Computer Games - BibleBytes & PC Enterprises - DOS[15]

1990–1999[edit]

1991[edit]

  • Bible Adventures - NES
  • Exodus: Journey to the Promised Land - NES
  • King of Kings: The Early Years - NES

1992[edit]

  • Bible Builder - DOS
  • Exodus: Journey to the Promised Land - DOS
  • Exodus: Journey to the Promised Land - Game Boy
  • Joshua & the Battle of Jericho - NES
  • Noah's Ark - NES
  • Spiritual Warfare - NES
  • Onesimus: A Quest for Freedom - DOS
  • Defender of the Faith - DOS

1993[edit]

  • Exodus: Journey to the Promised Land - Sega Genesis
  • Bible Buffet - NES

1994[edit]

  • Captain Bible in Dome of Darkness - DOS
  • King James Bible - Game Boy
  • Spiritual Warfare - Game Boy
  • Spiritual Warfare - Sega Genesis
  • Super 3D Noah's Ark - DOS, SNES

1995[edit]

  • Sunday Funday - NES
  • Bible Adventures - Sega Genesis

1996[edit]

  • Best of Bible Study and Games - DOS, Windows[16]
  • NIV Bible & the 20 Lost Levels of Joshua - Game Boy

1999[edit]

  • The War in Heaven - Windows
  • Saints of Virtue - Windows

  • Catechumen - Windows
  • Bible Touchdown - Windows
  • Desafios da Biblia - Windows
  • Children's Bible Stories - Windows

2001[edit]

  • Ominous Horizons - Windows
  • Nacah - Windows

2003[edit]

  • Isles of Derek - Windows

2004[edit]

  • The Walls of Jericho - Windows

2005[edit]

  • The Bible Game - PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance, Xbox

  • Nik & Kit - Windows, Online
  • Left Behind: Eternal Forces - Windows
  • LarryBoy and the Bad Apple - PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance
  • Modern Worship
  • Pop & Rock Hits - Windows, Macintosh
  • Timothy and Titus - Windows


2007[edit]

  • The Axys Adventures: Truth Seeker - Windows
  • Dance Praise Party - Windows, Macintosh
  • Dance Praise 2: The ReMix - Windows, Macintosh
  • Forgiveness: The Second Chapter - Windows
  • Left Behind: Tribulation Forces - Windows
  • Jesus in Space - Mac, PC

2008[edit]

  • Guitar Praise - Windows, Macintosh

2009[edit]

  • Adam's Venture - Windows
  • Heaven: The Game - Windows
  • Tomb of Moses - Windows

2010[edit]

  • Left Behind 3: Rise of the Antichrist
  • Testament

2011-present[edit]

  • The Story of Noah's Ark - Nintendo DS
  • Left Behind 4: World at War - PC
  • The Pilgrim's Progress - PC

2012[edit]

  • Bible Trivia: Avatar Edition - Xbox 360
  • GLOW: Guardian Light Of the World - iOS, Android

2013[edit]

  • 2 By 2 - Android
  • Bible Heroes: The Game - iOS, Android
  • Jesus Christ RPG - PC/Steam
  • Baby Jesus Christ RPG - PC/Steam
  • Rise Jesus Christ RPG - PC/Steam

2014[edit]

  • Granny's Bible Dojo - iOS
  • David vs. Goliath - iOS, Android
  • Game of Destiny - iOS
  • The Great Bible Race - Windows, Macintosh
  • Bible ABCs for Kids - iOS, Android
  • Reborn Crosswords - iOS
  • Kids Bible Quiz - iOS
  • Through The Shadows: The Darkness Revealed - PC
  • Adventures of Bible Bear - iOS
  • Fish Protector - iOS, Android
  • Qible: Quiz of the Bible - iOS, Android
  • Thorn and Crown - Android
  • Rionon: The Search for the Stone Statue - PC

  • Charlie Church Mouse 3D Bible Adventures - PC, iOS
  • Noah's Ark for Kids: Park the Ark - iOS, Android, Kindle
  • Guardians of Ancora - iOS, Android, Kindle[18]
  • Buddy Quest - PC
  • Five: Guardians of David - PC/Steam
  • Noah's Bunny Problem - iOS, Android
  • Kings of Israel - PC/Mac/Steam
  • Adam's Venture: Chronicles - PlayStation 3

2016[edit]

  • The Aetherlight: Chronicles of the Resistance - iOS, Android, PC, Mac
  • G Prime: Into the Rain - Xbox One
  • That Dragon, Cancer - PC/Mac/Linux/ios/Android/Ouya/Steam
  • Sheep Master - iOS, Android
  • Amazambane - Android
  • Moses The Freedom Fighter - iOS, Android
  • Heroes of Issachar - PC/Mac/Steam
  • FIVE: Champions of Canaan - PC/Oculus Rift/HTC Vive/OSVR/Steam
  • Adam's Venture: Origins - PC/Xbox One/PlayStation 4/Steam

  • Noah's Elephant in the Room - Android, iOS
